data.text: @KelvinK58193861 @topdowncharts agreed, this is the big difference between now vs 2020 at least
@Callum_Thomas @topdowncharts No bull market unless Powell changes course.

@Callum_Thomas @topdowncharts Lots of headwinds and a shifting monetary policy (maybe) could prolong this into a more extended period, like you said with 08-09’. Biggest factor to me is QT and balance sheet reduction, that will dictate the markets’ direction. I liken current envrmt to 14-15’

@Callum_Thomas @topdowncharts Great observation, and I definitely don’t think it’d be wise as an investor/trader to assume sentiment shifts immediately higher. Very good chance we range at neutral to negative sentiment for a little bit, however short term it’s probably a bit over exaggerated
@Callum_Thomas @topdowncharts Finally somebody showing these negative sentiment numbers mean shit
@BrianDelaney_ @Callum_Thomas @topdowncharts Interesting. I never heard that one before.
